title: How do l assign diff. notification sounds for diff. msgs or apps like watsup/sms?
content: I want to assign individualized sounds for individuals, or apps l use. Eg in watsup l have different groups l want to use sounds to pioritize the msgs. Yet all has only one sound or vib.l cant choose different sounds for different people msgs. Pls help. Is this Android 11 thing or the pixel thing? My old phone moto 4x l was able to do that. Thank you
